audioText: Le sang sur la bouche, il dit habituellement salut à dieu avant le jeu.
question: When does he usually say hello to God?
explanation: The text states 'Le sang sur la bouche, il dit habituellement salut à dieu avant le jeu.' - With blood on his mouth, he usually says hello to God before the game. 'Avant le jeu' means before the game, indicating the timing of his greeting.
